casebody.data:
City Court of New York — General Term, May, 1901.

Before Fitzsimons, Ch. J., Delehanty and S'chuchman, JJ.

James Morehouse, Respondent, v. The Chatham Electric Light Company, Appellant. Appeal from judgment entered on verdict of jury and from order denying motion for a new trial. Thomas H. Smith (Henry B. Twombly, of counsel), for appellant; A. M. & G. Card (Edward S. Grilling, of counsel), for respondent.

Judgment and order appealed from affirmed, with costs. No opinion.
